title: ‘I Didn’t Think I Could Win Today’: Bad Legs can’t keep Lotte Kopecky From Strade Bianche Triumph
content:
SD Worx-Protime teamwork makes Kopecky's dream work at Strade Bianche as world champion's confidence for spring classics grows.

Read the full article at ‘I Didn’t Think I Could Win Today’: Bad Legs can’t keep Lotte Kopecky From Strade Bianche Triumph on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
